narrative.narrative: Air Bashkortostan was around from April 2006 to October 2013. It was a subsidiary of VIM Airlines who owned 74% and the other 26% by the government of Bashkortostan. The region of Russia which it served from its capital of Ufa. Its main route was to Moscow Domodedovo, the hub of its parent, using 757-200's owned by VIM. Most of its life it had two of them assigned to the fleet. It also did charters,including to other countries in Europe and Asia. It also had a Diamond DA42 twin prop plane used to do aerial imaging.
